Elements

Class Scale

  • java.lang.Object
    • Elements.Scale
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConcreteScale

    public class Scale
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to encapsulate a diatonic scale.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scale(java.util.List<KeyLetterEnum> scaleNotes, ScaleModeEnum scaleName)
      Create a Scale object from a given list of KeyLetterEnum and a given ScaleModeEnum

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scale

        public Scale(java.util.List<KeyLetterEnum> scaleNotes,
             ScaleModeEnum scaleName)
        Create a Scale object from a given list of KeyLetterEnum and a given ScaleModeEnum
        Parameters:
        scaleNotes - the list of keys to be included in the scale
        scaleName - the scale mode of the Scale object
